    Function reference

    All functions

    GLRT()
    Generalized likelihood ratio test.
    GLRT_sig_plot()
    plot for GLRT significant results
    HighExprsGene(<Seurat>,<numeric>)
    generic HighExprsGene function for Seurat object
    HighExprsGene()
    generic HighExprsGene function definition
    Splice-class
    The Splice Class
    annoExonTable()
    Build exon table from annotated isoforms
    beta_dis()
    distance between two psi distribution modeled by beta.
    beta_mean()
    calculate mean value for a beta distribution
    beta_var()
    calculate variance for a beta distribution
    cellGeneExonCount()
    count exons in each cell
    createSpliceObject()
    Create a Splice object
    createSpliceSeurat()
    Create a Seurat object with Splice object
    dataAnnoCombine()
    combine the table for exon merge
    exonExonMerge()
    merge two exons
    exonMatrixMerge()
    combine the merge flag from data and annotation
    exonTable()
    Build exon table from isoforms
    exonTableMerge()
    merge exons
    exonTableMergeFlag()
    judge if exons can be merged
    exonTableMergeList()
    merge exons in an exon table according to to be merged list
    exon_corres()
    assign canonical exons to self annotated sub-exons
    exon_len_filter()
    filter out too short exons
    exon_search()
    Search if an exon is within an exon group.
    extractExonTable()
    build an exon count table for a gene
    gene_GLRT(<Seurat>,<character>,<character>,<character>)
    generic gene_GLRT function for Seurat object
    gene_GLRT(<Splice>,<character>,<vector>,<vector>)
    generic gene_GLRT function for Splice object
    gene_GLRT()
    generic gene_GLRT function definition
    gene_GLRT.base()
    Generalized likelihood ratio test for a gene.
    gene_exons_phi()
    compute phi for exons in a gene
    gene_exons_psi(<Seurat>,<character>,<character>,<character>)
    generic gene_exons_psi function for Seurat object
    gene_exons_psi(<Splice>,<character>,<character>,<character>)
    generic gene_exons_psi function for Splice object
    gene_exons_psi()
    generic genes_exons_psi function definition
    gene_exons_psi.base()
    compute psi for exons in a gene
    gene_exons_table(<Seurat>,<character>)
    generic gene_exons_table function for Seurat object
    gene_exons_table(<Splice>,<character>)
    generic gene_exons_table function for Splice object
    gene_exons_table()
    generic gene_exons_table function definition
    gene_exons_table.base()
    count exons in each cell from a Splice object
    genes_exons_phi(<Seurat>,<character>)
    generic genes_exons_phi function for Seurat object
    genes_exons_phi(<Splice>,<character>)
    generic genes_exons_phi function for Splice object
    genes_exons_phi()
    generic genes_exons_phi function definition
    genes_exons_phi.base()
    compute phi for exons in multi-genes
    genes_groups_GLRT(<Seurat>,<character>,<character>,<character>)
    generic genes_groups_GLRT function for Seurat object
    genes_groups_GLRT(<Splice>,<character>,<character>,<character>)
    generic genes_groups_GLRT function for Splice object
    genes_groups_GLRT()
    generic genes_groups_GLRT function definition
    genes_groups_GLRT.base()
    Generalized likelihood ratio test for multiples gene.
    getIsoform(<Seurat>,<character>)
    generic getIsoform function for Seurat object
    getIsoform(<Splice>,<character>)
    generic getIsoform function for Splice object
    getIsoform()
    generic getIsoform function definition
    getIsoform.base()
    extract isoforms
    getSplice()
    extract the Splice object from the Seurat object
    gtf_bed_corres()
    assign gtf exon annotations to self annotated sub-exons
    ifMerge()
    judge if two exons can be merged
    ll()
    negative log likelihood for exon psi
    mle_multi_start()
    mle for beta-binomial
    moduleExtract()
    collect exons to be merged into a list
    multiExonsMerge()
    merge multi-exons
    phi()
    count exon phi
    phiPlot()
    plot mean psi vs. phi scatter plot for each exon
    phi_conf()
    count the confidence interval for exon phi
    psiCellPlot(<Seurat>,<character>,<character>,<character>)
    generic psiCellPlot function for Seurat object
    psiCellPlot()
    generic psiCellPlot function definition
    psiCellPlot.base()
    plot psi value in cell embeddings
    psiHist(<Seurat>,<character>,<character>)
    generic psiHist function for Seurat object
    psiHist(<Splice>,<character>,<character>)
    generic psiHist function for Splice object
    psiHist()
    generic psiHist function definition
    psiHist.base()
    plot psi distribution
    transcript_corres()
    assign canonical isoform to self annotated sub-exons
